document.title: Blacks Leading the Future: Mapping Strategies in Your Organization and Your Life
document.abstract: Are you ready for leadership in your organization but find little support for your development? this workshop is uniquely designed to prepare emerging Black leaders for the new challenges of the 21st century. With massive retirements predicted in the future of most organizations, individuals who are prepared for this leadership gap will gain the competitive advantage. Participants will learn how to better position themselves in the future with a market edge.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
